Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IMonster, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tailor looks up in fear at the sound of your step, then turns back to his work. He appears to be sewing burial shrouds. "You'll have one soon enough, by the looks of you," he says, "But until then, how can I be of service?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the glassblower, busy at work heating a shapeless glass bulb over an alcohol flame. Looking up from his work, he asks, "Can I interest you in some glassware, sirrah?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A bent, wizened little man works upon a silver chain at a bench behind a wooden rail. "How may I help you?", he asks, without looking up from his work.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The astrologer, seated behind the table, stares at you from beneath bushy white brows. "Dost thou require a forecast?" he inquires. His robe and pointed hat mimic the walls, being dark in color and fairly covered in arcane symbols.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ali Kazam

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You near a short, pudgy man of swarthy complexion. He wears silk pyjamas and a turban, and he sports the silver amulet worn by a magician's senior apprentice. "What is your desire?" he asks, sizing you up with a penetrating stare.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Hokas Tokas

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You dimly make out your old friend Tokas through the thick haze of smoke. He is seated in lotus position upon a cushion of smoke; his eyes are rolled up in his head, and he seems unaware that you have entered the sanctum.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The carpenter eagerly looks up from the draw-knife work that he is performing on a rough-cut wooden stanchion. "Good sir!", he says, "What may I build for you today?" He eyes you carefully, and adds, "A coffin, perhaps?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The potter, spotted with bits of brown potting clay, comes forward. "How may I help you?" he asks. "Some earthenware? Perhaps a special commission, made to your specification?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The elderly apothecary shuffles towards you. He shouts, as the nearly deaf do, "Yes, sir! Yes, sir! What potion do you require? I have them all! Have them all, sir! Have them all!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The proprietor bows low. "Ah!" he says, eying your harness, "A man of arms! And what bit of leather-work can I interest you in today?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The village smith stands by the anvil, shaping an enormous sledgehammer head with blows from his hammer. A mighty man is he, with arms like iron bands. "And what would you be wanting?" he asks.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The stableboy dully looks up from his task of shoveling equine end-product. Seeing that you have no animal to stable and that you are not one of the owners of the weary animals here, he returns to his work.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The brewer stares at you from across one of the vats. "No samples!" he bellows. "Go next door! No guests allowed! So go away!" he glowers belligerently.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The baker bows to you, and beams, "Yes, sir! What may I sell you today? These rolls are freshly made!" He indicates a wicker basket that sits upon one end of the table.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The barkeep gives you a nod. He asks, "What's your pleasure, mister?" He wipes down the polished wooden bartop with an old rag. "The beer's been uncommonly good this month, since old Tokas was in and put a good word on it," he adds.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The pawnbroker flashes you an insincere smile as he sizes you up. "Buying, or selling?" he somewhat rudely asks. He continues to look you over, and adds, "Selling, most likely, by the look of you."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A pot-bellied swordsman in the uniform of the city guard is sitting on a bench in the inner armory, his feet propped atop a small keg. "Let's see your pass from the Duke," he says.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You behold a little old man on hands and knees, weeding the garden. He eyes you with a twinkle in his eye.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face a medium-sized serpent with enormous golden eyes. You notice that its scales look like tiny cobblestones. It rests atop a crude nest of sorts, and behaves as if it were guarding the nest from you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: glass warrior

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face a glittering assemblage of glass rods and planes. One arm of the glass warrior terminates in a wide round shield; the other in a long, sharp crystal splinter. Its eyes are made of the most amazing blue glass goggles.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: light warrior

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face an ethereal creature made from planes of white light. Its weapon is a length of blue light that coruscates with a blinding brilliance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: shadow warrior

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You detect a blacker shadow within the shadows of the room that moves with malevolence and purpose.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: outer guardsman

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face the eighty-eight spears of the outer guard. Their captain says, "Not open for public adoration today!"

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: drug-crazed spearman

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You encounter the three hundred fifty-two twitching spears of the inner guard. Their captain declares, "No admittance without proper credentials!"

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: drug-maddened warrior

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You approach the five hundred twelve drug-maddened warriors who guard the steps up to the altar. Their captain proclaims, "Only priests beyond this point!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face the nameless as he sits on his dark throne. Even as you watch, the formless black void of his being grows in extent as the malevolence in the room becomes almost palpable.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: damned soul

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You face a great horde of hundreds of damned souls, brought here to stop your progress, and perhaps even to weaken you before the final confrontation.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A wondrous blue being stands before you, stretching and unkinking himself in his new-found freedom. Suddenly he becomes motionless, and silently stares long and hard into your eyes.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
